## Simple data types

* Logical (TRUE or FALSE)
* Character ("a", "apple", ...)
* Numeric: 
  + integer (-1, 0, 1, 2, ...)
  + double (3.14, -2.0, ...)

---

## Simple data types

```{r}
logic_var <- TRUE
typeof(logic_var)
```

```{r}
char_var <- "apple"
typeof(char_var)
```

---

## Simple data types

```{r}
int_var <- 30L # Notice the L to force integer type
typeof(int_var)
```

```{r}
double_var <- 3.14
typeof(double_var)
```
